channel.title: [PI] Spawning Bug?
channel.description:
Hello, don't tell me this is in the wrong section also because there may be a server side fix.
Anyway, i got this new player who says he is a "java pro", he spawned items without any rights and said he edited the client. He said not a lot of people know this but i need to know of people who do, anyway, is there a server side fix to this because i really need this fixed, he also said he can overcome ip bans and if i did anything he would ddos me..
Thanks
